notes: The data sets contain 4 excel spreadsheets: 1. Departments population for the years 1985-2020, 2. Municipalities population for the years 1985-2020, 3. Population by Departments, Municipalities, five year age groups and gender for the years 1985-2020, 4. Population by Departments, Municipalities, simple ages and gender for the years 1985-2020.
